verses.kjv: When the LORD thy God shall bring thee into the land whither thou goest to possess it, and hath cast out many nations before thee, the Hittites, and the Girgashites, and the Amorites, and the Canaanites, and the Perizzites, and the Hivites, and the Jebusites, seven nations greater and mightier than thou;
verses.ct: When the LORD your God brings you into the land you are entering to take possession of, he will drive out many nations ahead of you — the Hittites, Girgashites, Amorites, Canaanites, Perizzites, Hivites, and Jebusites — 7 nations that are larger and more powerful than you.

verses.kjv: And when the LORD thy God shall deliver them before thee; thou shalt smite them, and utterly destroy them; thou shalt make no covenant with them, nor shew mercy unto them:
verses.ct: When the LORD your God hands them over to you, you must defeat them and completely destroy them. Don't make any covenant with them, and don't show them mercy.

verses.kjv: Neither shalt thou make marriages with them; thy daughter thou shalt not give unto his son, nor his daughter shalt thou take unto thy son.
verses.ct: Don't intermarry with them. Don't give your daughters to their sons, and don't take their daughters for your sons.

verses.kjv: For they will turn away thy son from following me, that they may serve other gods: so will the anger of the LORD be kindled against you, and destroy thee suddenly.
verses.ct: Because they will lead your children away from following me to worship other gods. Then the LORD's anger will burn against you, and he will quickly destroy you.

verses.kjv: But thus shall ye deal with them; ye shall destroy their altars, and break down their images, and cut down their groves, and burn their graven images with fire.
verses.ct: Instead, here is what you must do to them: tear down their altars, smash their sacred pillars, chop down their worship poles, and burn their carved idols in the fire.

verses.kjv: For thou art an holy people unto the LORD thy God: the LORD thy God hath chosen thee to be a special people unto himself, above all people that are upon the face of the earth.
verses.ct: You are a people set apart for the LORD your God. Out of all the peoples on the surface of the earth, the LORD your God has chosen you to be his treasured people.

verses.kjv: The LORD did not set his love upon you, nor choose you, because ye were more in number than any people; for ye were the fewest of all people:
verses.ct: The LORD didn't set his love on you and choose you because you were larger than other nations — in fact, you were the smallest of all peoples.

verses.kjv: But because the LORD loved you, and because he would keep the oath which he had sworn unto your fathers, hath the LORD brought you out with a mighty hand, and redeemed you out of the house of bondmen, from the hand of Pharaoh king of Egypt.
verses.ct: Rather, it was because the LORD loved you and was keeping the promise he swore to your ancestors that he brought you out with his mighty power and rescued you from slavery, from the grip of Pharaoh king of Egypt.

verses.kjv: Know therefore that the LORD thy God, he is God, the faithful God, which keepeth covenant and mercy with them that love him and keep his commandments to a thousand generations;
verses.ct: So understand that the LORD your God is the true God, the faithful God who keeps his covenant and shows mercy to those who love him and obey his commands, for 1,000 generations.

verses.kjv: And repayeth them that hate him to their face, to destroy them: he will not be slack to him that hateth him, he will repay him to his face.
verses.ct: But he pays back those who hate him directly, destroying them. He does not delay in dealing with those who hate him — he repays them personally.

verses.kjv: Thou shalt therefore keep the commandments, and the statutes, and the judgments, which I command thee this day, to do them.
verses.ct: So be careful to follow the commands, regulations, and laws that I am giving you today.

verses.kjv: Wherefore it shall come to pass, if ye hearken to these judgments, and keep, and do them, that the LORD thy God shall keep unto thee the covenant and the mercy which he sware unto thy fathers:
verses.ct: If you listen to these laws and carefully follow them, then the LORD your God will keep the covenant and the mercy he promised to your ancestors.

verses.kjv: And he will love thee, and bless thee, and multiply thee: he will also bless the fruit of thy womb, and the fruit of thy land, thy corn, and thy wine, and thine oil, the increase of thy kine, and the flocks of thy sheep, in the land which he sware unto thy fathers to give thee.
verses.ct: He will love you, bless you, and increase your numbers. He will bless your children, your crops — your grain, your wine, and your olive oil — the calves of your herds and the lambs of your flocks, in the land he swore to your ancestors to give you.

verses.kjv: Thou shalt be blessed above all people: there shall not be male or female barren among you, or among your cattle.
verses.ct: You will be more blessed than any other people. None among you will be unable to have children, and the same will be true of your livestock.

verses.kjv: And the LORD will take away from thee all sickness, and will put none of the evil diseases of Egypt, which thou knowest, upon thee; but will lay them upon all them that hate thee.
verses.ct: The LORD will remove every illness from you. He won't inflict on you any of the terrible diseases you saw in Egypt, but he will bring them on everyone who hates you.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt consume all the people which the LORD thy God shall deliver thee; thine eye shall have no pity upon them: neither shalt thou serve their gods; for that will be a snare unto thee.
verses.ct: You must destroy all the peoples that the LORD your God gives you victory over. Don't look on them with pity, and don't worship their gods, because that would become a trap for you.

verses.kjv: If thou shalt say in thine heart, These nations are more than I; how can I dispossess them?
verses.ct: You might think to yourself, 'These nations are stronger than we are — how can we possibly drive them out?'

verses.kjv: Thou shalt not be afraid of them: but shalt well remember what the LORD thy God did unto Pharaoh, and unto all Egypt;
verses.ct: Don't be afraid of them. Instead, carefully remember what the LORD your God did to Pharaoh and to all of Egypt —

verses.kjv: The great temptations which thine eyes saw, and the signs, and the wonders, and the mighty hand, and the stretched out arm, whereby the LORD thy God brought thee out: so shall the LORD thy God do unto all the people of whom thou art afraid.
verses.ct: the incredible trials you witnessed with your own eyes, the signs, the miracles, the mighty power, and the outstretched arm by which the LORD your God brought you out. The LORD your God will do the same thing to all the peoples you are afraid of.

verses.kjv: Moreover the LORD thy God will send the hornet among them, until they that are left, and hide themselves from thee, be destroyed.
verses.ct: On top of that, the LORD your God will send panic among them until even those who survive and hide from you are destroyed.

verses.kjv: Thou shalt not be affrighted at them: for the LORD thy God is among you, a mighty God and terrible.
verses.ct: Don't be terrified of them, because the LORD your God is right there with you — a great and awesome God.

verses.kjv: And the LORD thy God will put out those nations before thee by little and little: thou mayest not consume them at once, lest the beasts of the field increase upon thee.
verses.ct: The LORD your God will drive out these nations ahead of you gradually. You won't be able to eliminate them all at once, or the wild animals would multiply and overwhelm you.

verses.kjv: But the LORD thy God shall deliver them unto thee, and shall destroy them with a mighty destruction, until they be destroyed.
verses.ct: But the LORD your God will hand them over to you and throw them into total confusion until they are wiped out.

verses.kjv: And he shall deliver their kings into thine hand, and thou shalt destroy their name from under heaven: there shall no man be able to stand before thee, until thou have destroyed them.
verses.ct: He will give you victory over their kings, and you will erase their names from memory. No one will be able to stand against you until you have destroyed them.

verses.kjv: The graven images of their gods shall ye burn with fire: thou shalt not desire the silver or gold that is on them, nor take it unto thee, lest thou be snared therein: for it is an abomination to the LORD thy God.
verses.ct: You must burn the carved images of their gods in the fire. Don't be tempted by the silver or gold on them, and don't take it for yourself, or it will become a trap for you — because it is something the LORD your God detests.

verses.kjv: Neither shalt thou bring an abomination into thine house, lest thou be a cursed thing like it: but thou shalt utterly detest it, and thou shalt utterly abhor it; for it is a cursed thing.
verses.ct: Don't bring any detestable thing into your house, or you will be set apart for destruction just like it. You must completely despise it and absolutely hate it, because it is set apart for destruction.
